## About Our Summer School Programs

Our Summer School programs offer intensive, multi-week learning experiences designed to provide comprehensive education in specialized technical domains. Combining theoretical lectures, hands-on workshops, group projects, and networking events, these programs create a rich learning environment for participants from diverse backgrounds.

Led by renowned experts from academia and industry, our summer schools are ideal for students, professionals, and researchers looking to gain in-depth knowledge and practical skills in cutting-edge technology fields.

## Frequently Asked Questions

```{=html}

      </div>
      
      <div class="accordion-item">

        <div id="collapseTwo" class="accordion-collapse collapse" aria-labelledby="headingTwo" data-bs-parent="#summerSchoolFAQ">
          <div class="accordion-body">

For on-campus programs, accommodation can usually be arranged for an additional fee. Scholarships and discounts may be available for eligible participants. Detailed cost information is provided on each program's page.
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      
      <div class="accordion-item">
        <h2 class="accordion-header" id="headingThree">
          <button class="accordion-button collapsed" type="button" data-bs-toggle="collapse" data-bs-target="#collapseThree" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="collapseThree">

          </button>
        </h2>
        <div id="collapseThree" class="accordion-collapse collapse" aria-labelledby="headingThree" data-bs-parent="#summerSchoolFAQ">
          <div class="accordion-body">
            Yes, most of our summer school programs have an application process. Applicants typically need to submit their CV/resume, a statement of interest, and proof of relevant qualifications or experience. Some programs may have additional requirements such as recommendation letters or a portfolio of work. Applications are reviewed on a rolling basis until all spots are filled.
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      
      <div class="accordion-item">
        <h2 class="accordion-header" id="headingFour">

        <div id="collapseFour" class="accordion-collapse collapse" aria-labelledby="headingFour" data-bs-parent="#summerSchoolFAQ">
```
